short_summary: Request for Information on the next generation of Real Property (RP) services contracts for buildings.
description: To provide an overview of the next generation of Real Property (RP) services contracts for buildings, that will replace the existing contracts and add new ones.
full_summary:
======================================
### Government of Canada's Next Generation of Real Property Contracts for Buildings
======================================

#### Tender Information
-------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3736110541-Doc3736117193
* **Release Date**: December 1, 2022
* **Closing Date**: April 1, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date (Expected)**: December 31, 2022
* **Contract End Date (Expected)**: December 31, 2023

#### Request for Information (RFI)
-----------------------------------

The Government of Canada invites industry stakeholders to provide feedback and comments on the next generation of Real Property (RP) services contracts for buildings. This Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) serves as the first step towards the replacement of existing contracts and the addition of new ones. The RFEOI aims to gather information and insights from industry experts, which will aid in the development of a comprehensive strategy for Real Property services.

#### Contract Opportunities
---------------------------

* **Trade Classification**: Unspsc - 72000000, 81101513, and 95122100
* **Description**: Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services, Building Construction Management, and Accommodation Buildings and Structures

#### Contact Information
-----------------------

* **Name**: Michele Remillard
* **Email**: michele.remillard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Organization**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Notice Information
-------------------------

* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14774500?extsite=MTQ3NzQ1MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Support Documents**: None
